empty-pass-error-s: Password must include an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character
pass-error: Password must be at least 6 characters long
name: Enter Your Name
age-error-s: Sorry, age must be at least 20
dis1: Our app helps you find the perfect college based on your preferences.
dis2: You can explore universities, their colleges, and the best options available for your aspirations.
dis3: Discover every university and its colleges to make an informed choice for your future!
info1: Our platform collaborates with a variety of renowned universities, offering you access to many colleges and programs.
info2: From top engineering schools to prestigious art academies, you can explore diverse options and apply to the college of your choice seamlessly.
info3: Join us to take the next step in your educational journey.
